data.title: Me Without You details
data.meta_description: Spanning the 1970's and 1980's, this is the story of two best friends (Williams, Friel) living in the suburbs of London.
data.text:
Description: Spanning the 1970's and 1980's, this is the story of two best friends (Williams, Friel) living in the suburbs of London.

Production Company Fireworks Pictures, Samuel Goldwyn Films, Momentum Pictures, Road Movies Filmproduktion, Isle of Man Film Commission, British Screen Productions, British Sky Broadcasting (BSkyB), Dakota Films, Finola Dwyer Productions, WAVEpictures, MEDIA Programme of the European Union, Isle of Man Film, Wildgaze Films

Release Date Jul 5, 2002

Duration 1 h 47 m

Rating R

Genres

Tagline From Sandra Goldbacher, writer/director of The Governess, comes a film about the agonies and ecstasies of friendship.
